comment.author: 22233073@N03
comment._content: I believe this is on Ocean Ave just south of Church Ave. It's an earlier version of the First Baptist Church of Flatbush that ended up moving to Lenox and Nostrand: "The church's first venture in a building was on Ocean Avenue, at a point near what is now 544 Ocean Avenue. The Dutch Reformed Church of Flatbush leased to the Baptist people a plot of ground there, and the few Baptists, after much toil and sacrifice, erected a small frame building thereon, which they called 'The Tabernacle.'" books.google.com/books?id=EtsTAAAAYAAJ&dq=%22first%20... This Brooklyn Eagle article has a similar story: eagle.brooklynpubliclibrary.org/Repository/ml.asp?Ref=QkV... And this 1884 drawing seems to confirm it's the same building: books.google.com/books?id=fpwvAAAAYAAJ&dq=baptist%20o...
